title: ZK I Zettel 7,2m21b - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body:
7,2m21b
					2 Gegen die rein logische Auffassung der Ideologie-einheit auch Naess, S. 170 und dort zit. "The authorita-rian personality" (ed. Adorno u.a.), p. 5vgl. dazu auch 8,5d8 Walter Cerf, Value Decisions unterscheidet Wertsystemund Wertkombination. S. 29: "By value combination …… is meant that grouping of values that is notbrought about by the values themselves that arecombined, but is due to some external agency.A value combination has to be distinguishedfrom a value system, which is a grouping of suchvalues as could not be values without eachother. In a value system the participating valuesimply each other, in a value combination they do not".
